document.full_text: the swift resolution of the case, where an ethnic han killed an ethnic mongolian herder in a hit-and-run accident last month, reflected chinese leaders' deep concern about ethnic tensions.
document.title: asia: chinese truck driver sentenced to death over accident
lines_and_colors: the swift resolution of the case, where an ethnic han killed an ethnic mongolian herder in a hit-and-run accident last month, reflected chinese leaders' deep concern about ethnic tensions.
